shot.composition: POV tight squeeze, following a red blood cell as it dramatically deforms to pass through an extremely narrow capillary. 16:9.
shot.lens: High-magnification macro probe lens (1000x), very shallow depth of field, emphasizing claustrophobia.
shot.camera_movement: Slowed down, pressurized movement, scraping against the walls, navigating extreme tight turns and compressions.

subject.description: A single red blood cell visibly stretching, bending, and folding. Its membrane appears elastic, textured, and resilient. Cells moving in single file.
subject.props: Oxygen molecules visibly diffusing from the cell into the surrounding tissue (glowing cyan particles).

scene.environment: Extremely tight passage, walls are thin (single-cell layer) and translucent. Dense surrounding tissue visible dimly outside the vessel.

visual_details.action: The cell struggling and bending. The camera experiences the intimacy and tightness of the environment, emphasizing the vital moment of oxygen delivery.
visual_details.special_effects: Visible deformation physics, subtle light diffusion through tissue, visible diffusion effects.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Wide open spaces, fast movement, smooth walls, low detail, blurriness, chromatic aberration, flickering, black and white, grey tones, minimalism.

cinematography.lighting: High-contrast, dramatic lighting filtering through the thin walls, deep shadows. The cell glows faintly as it releases oxygen.
cinematography.color_palette: Vibrant red transitioning to deeper crimson, pale pink, soft whites, cyan highlights.

audio.music: Tense, minimalist ambient score. High sustained strings and low pulsating synths (Brian Eno style).
audio.ambient: Muffled heartbeat, very faint fluid movement, quiet environment.
audio.sound_effects: Scraping sounds, creaking/stretching sounds of the cell membrane. Soft shimmer sound synchronized with oxygen diffusion.
